references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 2.
Uhler, Horace S.; Recalculation and extension of the modulus and of the logarithms of 2, 3, 5, 7 and 17. Proc. Nat. Acad. Sci. U. S. A. 26, (1940). 205-212.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy].
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=log(7); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b016630.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 16 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A016735 Continued fraction. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 16 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Fixed my PARI program, had -n _Harry J. Smith_, May 19 2009
